mapper.select: select id, play_category_id, dict_double_scheme, dict_number_scheme, dict_pursue_scheme, dict_amount_model, is_occupy, create_time, update_time from yjcycc_lottery.bs_plan_config where id = #{id} limit 1

select id, play_category_id, dict_double_scheme, dict_number_scheme, dict_pursue_scheme, dict_amount_model, is_occupy, create_time, update_time from yjcycc_lottery.bs_plan_config where id = #{id} limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into yjcycc_lottery.bs_plan_config(play_category_id, dict_double_scheme, dict_number_scheme, dict_pursue_scheme, dict_amount_model, is_occupy, create_time, update_time) values (#{playCategoryId}, #{dictDoubleScheme}, #{dictNumberScheme}, #{dictPursueScheme}, #{dictAmountModel}, #{isOccupy}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.update:
update yjcycc_lottery.bs_plan_config
play_category_id = #{playCategoryId},
dict_double_scheme = #{dictDoubleScheme},
dict_number_scheme = #{dictNumberScheme},
dict_pursue_scheme = #{dictPursueScheme},
dict_amount_model = #{dictAmountModel},
is_occupy = #{isOccupy},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
where id = #{id}
mapper.delete: delete from yjcycc_lottery.bs_plan_config where id in (${ids})
